Articles.Content:
I've started on this project a while back, parallel with my work on SELV, but somehow lost interest in it again. Now I've revived the project again and I wonder if there would be any interest in this. It's basically supposed to be a pack including 3 different rockets, a SLV (Small Launch Vehicle) for small payloads to LKO or MKO (>120km and < 2868km), a MLV (Medium Launch Vehicle) and a BLV (Big Launch Vehicle). They each are not supposed to be really stockalike (this is why I didn't want to integrate it into SELV), but with more realistic models but custom textures. This is the SLV, based on ESAs Vega rocket.

3 solid stages and one small liquid fuel upper stage for final orbital insertion.

I wonder now if there are enough people now offering interest in this for me to continue on it and eventually release it.

Well, offering my two cents - if it's not intended for use with RO, I would prefer it to be stockalike. Simply put, there are two main art styles for KSP. Realistic, and stock. Realistic obviously being the style preferred for Realism Overhaul, while Stockalike is used for, well, everything else. Unless you're planning on doing a total conversion for the game, then making it fit into the art style of the intended playstyle is probably a good move. Again, that's just my two cents.
Darn. Thought this was going to be a blue origin new shepherd clone. That would be neat, I think the stock alike real rocket market is big enough.

19 hours ago, DarthVader said:

Darn. Thought this was going to be a blue origin new shepherd clone. That would be neat, I think the stock alike real rocket market is big enough.

What would you even do with a New Shepherd in KSP? It's basically a sounding rocket for completing tourist contracts.

Edited January 10, 2016 by CobaltWolf

1 hour ago, CobaltWolf said:

What would you even do with a New Shepherd in KSP? It's basically a sounding rocket for completely tourist contracts.

Would be the perfect for career tourist contracts.

Looks Amazing--Is texture switching going to be enabled on this?

Also what rockets are you planning to base your MLV and BLV on?
